title: Multiplying Each Root
text: Recall the formula of Product of Conjugate: $$\left(a+b\right) \left(a-b\right)=a^2-b^2$$
speech: Recall the formula of Product of Conjugate:  parentheses a plus b,  times, parentheses a minus b,  is equal to, a squared minus b squared
pacedSpeech: Recall the formula of Product of Conjugate:    a plus b,  times,  a minus b,  is equal to, a squared minus b squared

title: Simplifying the Product
speech: As  a is equal to 5 ,  b, is equal to 2 the square root of 3 ,  a squared minus b squared is equal to 13
pacedSpeech: ,   b, is equal to 2 the square root of 3
,   a squared minus b squared is equal to 13
